item.title: Holly add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "What are these fundamental principles, if they are not atoms?" "Stories. And they give me hope." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Holly add a quote by Ryu Murakami
item.description: "People who love horror films are people with boring lives... when a really scary movie is over, you're reassured to see that you're still alive and the world still exists as it did before. That's the real reason we have horror films - they act as shock absorbers - and if they disappeared altogether, I bet you'd see a big leap in the number of serial killers. After all, anyone stupid enough to get the idea of murdering people from a movie could get the same idea from watching the news." -- Ryu Murakami

item.title: Holly add a quote by Ben Neihart
item.description: "God, I love you so much I won't ever try to have sex again." -- Ben Neihart

item.title: Holly add a quote by Kathe Koja
item.description: "To work and work and never mind why; if you kept looking for the why behind everything you might never work again, you might never bother to breathe again." -- Kathe Koja

item.title: Holly add a quote by Robert Dawson
item.description: "Gods have a way of sprouting from vacant lots." -- Robert Dawson

item.title: Holly add a quote by Kaori Yuki
item.description: "I'm gonna kick your miserable ass, God!" -- Kaori Yuki

item.title: Holly add a quote by J. Michael Straczynski
item.description: "It is not for the gods to decide whether or not Man exists - it is for Man to decide whether or not the gods exist." -- J. Michael Straczynski
